title: Sustainable Mathematics Project Through Relational Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding basic mathematical concepts (arithmetic, algebra, statistics)
context.additional_context: Smartphone-enabled data collection/analysis environment providing field investigation opportunities for community problem-solving

learning_goals: Learners can convert ecological data into mathematical models and create analytical reports linked to the Sustainable Development Goals (SDGs).
Learners can apply an equity-based approach to mathematically model resource distribution issues in communities and propose solutions.
Learners can collaborate with peers using relational learning methodologies to complete a mathematical project integrating multiple perspectives on sustainability.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
